title: Database engine and session factory
description: Implement `app/db/engine.py` with async SQLAlchemy engine setup. Create `create_async_engine(DATABASE_URL)` with pool_pre_ping=True and reasonable pool settings (pool_size=5, max_overflow=10). Create `async_sessionmaker` with expire_on_commit=False. Implement `get_session()` async generator for dependency injection that yields AsyncSession and ensures proper cleanup.
acceptance_criteria:
- `app/db/engine.py` exports engine and async_sessionmaker
- `get_session()` async generator yields AsyncSession
- Pool settings configured properly
- expire_on_commit=False set
